mapper.insert: INSERT INTO research_project_member(project_id, person_id, duty, join_date, remark) VALUES (#{projectId}, #{personId}, #{duty}, #{joinDate}, #{remark})
mapper.select: SELECT m.id, m.project_id, m.person_id, m.duty, m.join_date, m.remark, u.emp_no AS empNo, u.real_name AS personName FROM research_project_member m LEFT JOIN sys_user u ON u.id = m.person_id WHERE m.project_id = #{projectId} ORDER BY m.id ASC
